meanings.definition: A unit of weight in Turkey and Persia, varying in different localities from about 120 to 160 pounds.
A unit of weight in Egypt, varying in different localities from about 120 to 150 pounds.
A unit of weight in Greece, varying in different localities from about 100 to 120 pounds.
A unit of weight in Syria, varying in different localities from about 150 to 200 pounds.
